qas.question: In the field of immunology, what aspect is becoming more specialized?
What new areas are immunologists studying with more frequency?
The latest research into newer aspects of immunology is focused on what three elements of the body?
These three elements of the body are of new interest for what reason?

answers.text: not previously associated with the immune system

context: Immunological <a0_0>research<a0_0/> continues to become more specialized, pursuing <a1_0>non-classical models of immunity<a1_0/> and functions of <a2_0>cells, organs and systems<a2_0/> <a3_0>not previously associated with the immune system<a3_0/> (Yemeserach 2010).
